predictions.text: The FOMC will leave the federal funds target range unchanged at 5.25%–5.50% at its December 2025 meeting.
predictions.verification_criteria: Federal Reserve press release on 2025-12-11 shows target range unchanged at 5.25%–5.50% versus the prior meeting.
monitoring_signals: Treasury yield curve and term premium
predictions.rationale: Inflation is easing and the Fed is set to update projections rather than surprise with a rate move.

predictions.text: The Bank of England will leave Bank Rate unchanged at its December 2025 policy meeting.
predictions.verification_criteria: BoE Monetary Policy Summary for December 2025 shows Bank Rate unchanged from the prior meeting level.
monitoring_signals: Gilt yields and SONIA OIS pricing
predictions.rationale: Growth is soft and inflation is moderating; BoE likely to hold while assessing incoming data.

predictions.text: U.S. Existing-Home Sales (SAAR) for November 2025 will print between 3.70 million and 4.10 million.
predictions.verification_criteria: NAR’s official November 2025 Existing-Home Sales press release reports SAAR within 3.70–4.10 million.
monitoring_signals: Active listings and days on market
predictions.rationale: High mortgage rates and elevated delistings suggest weak closings.

predictions.text: S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller 20-City Home Price Index (YoY) for October 2025 will print between +1.5% and +3.5%.
predictions.verification_criteria: S&P Dow Jones Indices release shows the 20-City Composite YoY percent change for October 2025 within +1.5% to +3.5%.
predictions.rationale: Affordability constraints are cooling price growth without causing broad declines.

predictions.text: NOAA SWPC will issue at least one G3 (Strong) Geomagnetic Storm watch, warning, or alert by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: An official SWPC message (watch/warning/alert) explicitly labeled 'G3 (Strong) Geomagnetic Storm' appears on swpc.noaa.gov or official product feeds during the period.
predictions.rationale: Solar Cycle 25 is near peak; G3 events are relatively frequent around solar maximum.

predictions.text: EIA will report U.S. crude oil field production at or above 13.4 million barrels/day in at least one Weekly Petroleum Status Report released by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Within any WPSR released by the deadline, Table 1 'U.S. Field Production of Crude Oil' weekly estimate is ≥ 13.4 million b/d.
monitoring_signals: Rig count and frac spread data
predictions.rationale: Output is at record highs and trending modestly upward.

predictions.text: NYMEX WTI crude oil front-month futures will settle at or above $85.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group official settlement for the prompt WTI contract is ≥ $85.00 on any trading day through the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Middle East and Russia supply risks
U.S. crude and product inventory draws
predictions.rationale: Supply risks and potential draws could briefly push prices higher.

predictions.text: NYMEX Henry Hub natural gas front-month futures will settle at or below $2.25 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group official settlement for the prompt Henry Hub contract is ≤ $2.25 per MMBtu on any trading day through the deadline.
predictions.rationale: High storage and mild weather risk could briefly pressure prices.

predictions.text: The U.S. Commerce Department (BIS) will add at least one China-based AI accelerator or chip design firm to the Entity List by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A BIS press release or Federal Register notice lists a PRC AI chip/accelerator firm newly added to the Entity List during the period.
monitoring_signals: Congressional pressure on China tech controls
Reporting on PRC AI hardware supply chains
predictions.rationale: Policy remains fluid; selective tightening may accompany targeted allowances.

predictions.text: Paramount Global or Warner Bros. Discovery will publicly disclose receipt of a 'Second Request' under the HSR Act in connection with a proposed Paramount–WBD transaction by 2026-01-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: An 8-K, press release, or court filing from either company states DOJ/FTC issued a Request for Additional Information (Second Request) for a Paramount–WBD deal within the period.
monitoring_signals: HSR filing date and waiting period status
Media reports of Second Request issuance
predictions.rationale: If a filing proceeds, market concentration concerns make a Second Request likely.

predictions.text: Waymo will report achieving at least 500,000 weekly paid robotaxi rides on at least one week by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: An official Waymo blog post, press release, or regulatory filing states weekly paid rides ≥ 500,000 during the period.
predictions.rationale: Scaling from 450k to 500k weekly appears achievable with ongoing expansion.

predictions.text: The European Commission will open at least one new formal non-compliance proceeding under the Digital Markets Act against a designated gatekeeper by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: An official European Commission press release announces initiation of a DMA non-compliance investigation (Article 29) against a gatekeeper during the period.
predictions.rationale: DMA enforcement cadence and open issues make another proceeding plausible.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI Shelter index (YoY, NSA) for November 2025 will print between 4.8% and 5.6%.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS CPI detailed tables report the CPI-U Shelter index year-over-year percent change for November 2025 within 4.8%–5.6%.
monitoring_signals: Apartment List and Zillow rent indices
Vacancy rates and lease renewal terms
OER trends in recent CPI reports
predictions.rationale: Private rent data show cooling; shelter disinflation is gradual.
